attributes.action: Save the Folkestone Crown Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Folkestone Crown Post Office in Bouverie Square is being ear-marked for closure and the service being moved to the nearby WHSmiths store. The Crown Post Office is always busy and on certain days the queues can be long. The WHSmiths store is too small to be able to cope with the demand. There will also be a loss of jobs not to mention the closure of the Sorting Office.
